Title: Choose a playbook and (optionally) a starting build.
Summary: Choose from a list of predefined playbooks, and optionally choose a starting build from it. Or, create your own build or choose a custom playbook.

Title: Choose a heritage and a background.
Summary: Choose a heritage and a background from lists of predefined options, or create your own.

Title: Assign action dots.
Summary: Assign action dots in addition to the action dots given by your playbook.

Title: Choose a special ability.
Summary: Choose a special ability from your playbook, or create your own for your custom playbook.

Title: Choose your contacts and vice.
Summary: Choose one contact to be a close friend, and one contact to be your rival. Additionally, choose your vice and your purveyor.

Title: Finalize your character.
Summary: Record your name, alias, and look and finalize your character.

Title: Choose your extra advances (optional).
Summary: Choose your extra advances, if you have any.
